body.name: Evolur Madison 5-In-1 Curved Top Convertible Crib In Antique Grey Mist, Features 3 Mattress Height Settings, Wooden Nursery And Bedroom Furniture, Baby Crib
features: A FRENCH TOUCH - Taking inspiration from the 14th-century architecture of the small French town of Dinan, the Madison features a full-panel headboard, exquisite art deco inlay trim, fluted legs, bi-level molding and a footboard with routing lines

5-in-1 CONVERTIBILITY - The Madison converts to a toddler bed with our conversion kit (sold separately) and daybed; Add our wooden bed frame (sold separately) to convert it into a full-size bed; It also features 3 mattress height settings
TIMELESS FINISH - The Madison is available in finishes that complements any color scheme and is perfect for a boy or girl nursery; The crib is crafted out of kiln-dried hardwood with fine veneers

SAFETY FIRST - Our cribs are built to the highest safety standards that meet/exceed those set by the CPSC, JPMA and ASTM; Each of our cribs undergoes rigorous testing by independent laboratories for compliance with all US and Canadian crib regulations

A LIFETIME INVESTMENT - Pick coordinating pieces from our Evolur Madison Collection like the double dresser, tall chest, hutch/bookcase and nightstand to create an timeless nursery; Crib dimensions are 58.75″ L x 31.25″ W x 51.50″ H
body.description: Taking inspiration from the 14th-century architecture of the small French town of Dinan, the Madison 5-in-1 Convertible features a full-panel headboard, exquisite art deco inlay trim, fluted legs, bi-level molding and a footboard with routing lines. The Madison is built to last. It grows with your child converting in to a toddler bed with our conversion kit (sold separately) and daybed. Add our wooden bed frame (sold separately) to convert it into a full-size bed. It also features 3 mattress height settings. Crafted out of kiln-dried hardwood with fine veneers, the Madison is durable and a fantastic value for money.The Madison is available in a timeless Antique Mist finish that complements any color scheme and is perfect for a boy or girl nursery. At Evolur, safety is always our No.1 priority - Our cribs are built to the highest safety standards that meet/exceed those set by the CPSC, JPMA and ASTM. Each of our cribs undergoes rigorous testing by independent laboratories for compliance with all US and Canadian crib regulations.A lifetime investment, you can pick coordinating pieces from our Evolur Madison Collection like the double dresser, tall chest, hutch/bookcase and nightstand to create an timeless nursery. For the best mattress fit, we recommend any Dream on Me or Evolur standard, full-size, non-toxic, Greenguard certified crib mattress (sold separately).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and color
reviews.reviewText: Great quality for the price. It’s hard to find decent furniture these days. I was skeptical at first buying the furniture online without being able to see the color and quality in person. It won’t disappoint for the price. It is much better quality then furniture that you have to assemble. All of the Evolur furniture comes pre assembled. The crib does come in pieces though because it has to since it is a 5 in 1 convertible crib/bed. Very easy to put together in less than 10 minutes. It’s the best quality furniture that you are going to get these days without spending thousands at a high end furniture store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Needing another crib for my second kid, I researched for a solid week for what crib I would want. I found this beauty and HAD to have it. I checked out all the typical baby stores that would carry it before I found it on Amazon. Let me say, I am very leery of furniture delivery for nursery furniture. My first crib for my first child was a nightmare (broken headboard, long delays, poor customer service). After comparing all my options, Amazon had the best prices and delivery windows.The breakdown.1. The crib is beautiful. My mother even went gaga for it.2. Delivery was insanely fast for furniture. I think I placed the order on a Wednesday/Thursday, and we had it delivered by Saturday. My other options were giving me 1-2 week windows.While I was super nervous to order the crib off of Amazon, I was super impressed with quality and delivery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color slightly off but still beautiful!
reviews.reviewText: I tried looking a pictures to detail the actual color but all the previous review pictures have different lighting and it looked different in all of them, I still decided to purchase and see the color for myself. The color is definitely more beige than gray and lighter. Not as gray as I was expecting but nonetheless it’s beautiful! The second picture shows the actual color and the remaining pics is the tone it looks like with natural sunlight. It is Sturdy, and super quick to assemble. My husband and I are both in love with this set! Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Our daughter is almost two and this crib is still as perfect as the day we bought it. Absolutely love everything about it! The color in person is a mix between a very light grey/cream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2019
reviews.reviewText: After a few months of looking at cribs, going back and forth with my wife we still couldn’t find the crib we imagined until we looked on amazon and found this one. Evolur is a a Legit company out of New Jersey with their own website where you can find extra parts and matching pieces to this collection. I went on their website and requested a few swatches be sent to me that came a couple days later to help chose the color. The crib is beautiful and was very easy to put together- it took about 30 minutes to put together with very easy directions and tools. I found many of this company’s collections to be beautiful but the “Madison” collection seemed right for us at our price point. I would Definitely recommend this crib or any product from Evolur.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product & amazing quality items!
reviews.reviewText: We loved everything about our Évolur Madison crib set and was beyond satisfied with our decision 3 years later. Recently added the conversion toddler gate and again very happy with our choose and would recommend this product to anyone and everyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: SUCH A SOLID CRIB. Absolutely obsessed with this crib, it’s so beautiful and feels extremely sturdy.
